children.value: 34. Write a C program to interchange diagonals of a matrix.

Enter 9 co-efficients of the matrix-
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
The given matrix is
 1 2 3
 4 5 6
 7 8 9

 Matrix Elements after Interchanging Diagonals are:
 3  2  1
 4  5  6
 9  8  7
